551.question: What tasks were evaluated?

5-Table1-1.png: The tasks evaluated were: 1) Detection of an expert by a reviewer, 2) Prediction of the customer generated review, 3) Prediction of the global trend of an expert, 4) Prediction of whether the rating of an expert is positive or negative, 5) Prediction of the exact rating of an expert, 6) Prediction of the list of all the experts whose reviews can be trusted, 7) Comparison between experts, and 8) Prediction of the strengths and weaknesses of an expert.</s>

The tasks evaluated in ReviewQA are: 1) Determination of an expert by a reviewer, 2) Prediction of the customer's general satisfaction, 3) Prediction of the global trend of an expert, 4) Prediction of whether the rating of an expert is positive or negative, 5) Prediction of the exact rating of an expert, 6) Prediction of the list of all the experts whose works are similar to that of the reviewer, 7) Comparison between experts, and 8) Prediction of the strengths and weaknesses of an expert.</s>

551.answer: Detection of an aspect in a review, Prediction of the customer general satisfaction, Prediction of the global trend of an aspect in a given review, Prediction of whether the rating of a given aspect is above or under a given value, Prediction of the exact rating of an aspect in a review, Prediction of the list of all the positive/negative aspects mentioned in the review, Comparison between aspects, Prediction of the strengths and weaknesses in a review
